cookie_description: We use cookies to enhance your experience. You can customize your preferences below.
essential_desc: Required for the website to function. Cannot be disabled.
analytics_desc: Help us understand how you use our app to improve it.
marketing_desc: Used to show you relevant ads and measure campaign effectiveness.
age_verification_desc: You must be at least {{age}} years old to use this application.
age_requirement: You must be at least {{age}} years old to access this content.
coppa_notice: We comply with COPPA regulations to protect children's privacy online.
breach_support: If you have concerns, please contact our support team.
health_disclaimer_1: This app provides general fitness information and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment.
health_disclaimer_2: Always consult with a qualified healthcare provider before starting any exercise program or making changes to your diet.
health_disclaimer_3: If you experience pain, dizziness, or discomfort during exercise, stop immediately and seek medical attention.
disclaimer_checkbox: I understand that this app does not provide medical advice and I will consult a healthcare professional before making health-related decisions.
consult_professional: For medical emergencies, contact emergency services immediately.
ccpa_description: Under the California Consumer Privacy Act, you have the right to opt out of the sale of your personal information.
do_not_sell: Do Not Sell My Personal Information
do_not_sell_desc: When enabled, we will not sell your personal data to third parties.
ccpa_updated: Your CCPA preferences have been updated
hipaa_description: Authorize the use and disclosure of your protected health information.
pipeda_description: Under Canada's Personal Information Protection and Electronic Documents Act, you have specific rights regarding your personal data.
pipeda_consent_desc: I consent to the collection, use, and disclosure of my personal information as described in the privacy policy.
pipeda_withdraw: You may withdraw consent at any time. Withdrawing consent may limit your ability to use certain features.
pipeda_access_desc: You have the right to access your personal information held by us.
pipeda_correction_desc: You have the right to request correction of inaccurate personal information.
pipeda_complaint_desc: You may file a complaint with the Office of the Privacy Commissioner of Canada.
accessibility_description: Customize the app to meet your accessibility needs.
high_contrast_desc: Increase color contrast for better visibility
large_text_desc: Increase text size throughout the app
reduce_motion_desc: Reduce or disable animations and transitions
screen_reader_desc: Optimize layout for screen reader compatibility
keyboard_nav_desc: Enhanced keyboard navigation with visible focus indicators
focus_indicators_desc: Show visible outlines around focused elements
wcag_description: This app strives to meet WCAG 2.1 Level AA accessibility standards.
terms_update_description: Please review and accept our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy to continue using Wellio.
accept_tos: I accept the Terms of Service
must_accept_both: You must accept both to continue
do_not_sell_label: Do Not Sell My Personal Information
do_not_sell_desc: When enabled, we will not sell your personal data to third parties.
ccpa_preference_updated: Your privacy preferences have been updated
ccpa_rights_notice: Under the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA), California residents have the right to opt out of the sale of their personal information. We do not sell your data, but this setting ensures your preferences are recorded.
opt_out_description: When enabled, we will not sell or share your personal information with third parties for advertising purposes.
ccpa_more_info: For more information about your privacy rights, please see our
breach_notification_desc: Important information about your account security
action_monitor: Monitor your account for suspicious activity
action_support: Contact support if you notice anything unusual
